title: Stuck at que screen after timer ends
body:
LoL got broke? Anyone else stuck like me?

Waited about 5 mins, clicked the X to exit and got back into lol and now stuck at the Reconnect to game button. 
 
EDIT>>> 15 mins since It happened and still unable to click the reconnect button. Hopefully it's fixed shortly and no downtime :(\

EDIT>>> Straight after that edit (Approx 15-20mins since stuck), I relogged in and am at the start screen. Hopefully its fixed. Thanks everyone for the updates!

replies.body: FINALLY, everyone slowly reconnecting in load screen...
well my game finally has decided to load
I get stuck @ login. Did a speed test - my connection seems fine. Given all the complaints I suspect something @ riots end?

wtf me too
im stuck on champion select
if i get priority queue from this... time to move on to dota and csgo

> [{quoted}](name=BaLlSyUnIcOrN101,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=zlXNEnAr,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-04-12T08:52:39.854+0000)
>
> wtf me too
> im stuck on champion select
> if i get priority queue from this... time to move on to dota and csgo

Please don't leave, that would be a huge loss /s

this aint tolerable...
dota and csgo doesnt do this
it got into a 2 v 5 game ended in 9 minutes...
GG

> [{quoted}](name=BaLlSyUnIcOrN101,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=zlXNEnAr,comment-id=000300000000,timestamp=2015-04-12T09:17:19.867+0000)
>
> this aint tolerable...
> dota and csgo doesnt do this
> it got into a 2 v 5 game ended in 9 minutes...
> GG

mfw people think all servers are 100% reliable, DOtA has done this heaps, as has CS:GO, get your head outta your ass.

while your waiting...fapfapfap and then hope that rito will be mesmerised enough by it to fix servers
EDIT: up and working...I guess fapping worked TY RIOT mwah
I had the same problem, so I left and got stuck trying to 'reconnect' to the game. It took about 15mins of just waiting and clicking reconnect. What the hell League?
Rito pls... what is going on.

Yeah bro i'm stuck as well.

Prepare Yourselves! The battle of waiting an hour before the game actually loads in, is about to begin...
